message: Bob, I'm proposing I take $70 and you take $30.  It's in our best interests to settle this now before inflation eats away at the value.
Alice, your offer was unfair. Let's be reasonable, I'll take $60 and you take $40. This deal benefits us both before inflation hurts you more.
Bob, let's be practical. This is my final offer. Take it before inflation shrinks the pot even further for both of us.
